    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.hardware \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module reliafree.hardware}

    \label{reliafree:hardware}
This is the Class that is used to represent and hold information related to
the assemblies of the Program.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                                Classes                                %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\subsection{Classes}

\begin{itemize}  \setlength{\parskip}{0ex}
  \item \textbf{Hardware}: The Hardware class is simply the treeview that holds and displays the 
system tree in the ReliaFree Treebook.



  \textit{(Section \ref{reliafree:hardware:Hardware}, p.~\pageref{reliafree:hardware:Hardware})}

\end{itemize}
